there is over
for example they made some of my

they made an electronic 180 in the

there's also Burzum whose sudden change

inspired album this record is pretty

into the wheelhouse of Vangelis jean

dream all artists that are completely of
my alley so listening to this record was
like throwing a duck in the water now
there are some added layers of noise to
these synthesizers and horns and

between these very heavy subterranean

throne room pulled together a pretty
diverse set of sounds for this record
the opener on this LP brings a series of
